name: Swiss Post
description: The following features are available:  CODE SCANNER  available via QR code icon: With the scan function, you can scan the barcodes and QR codes on consignment documents. You can also enter consignment numbers manually. Business cards with a printed QR code can be scanned simply and the information saved in the devices contact details.  LOCATION SEARCH: The app determines your location and indicates the nearest post offices, Postomats and PickPost points. The location search remains available even when your GPS is deactivated.  TRACK & TRACE: You can scan barcodes on letter mail, international consignments and parcels, and QR codes on receipts from post offices. The consignment number is then entered automatically in the Track & Trace overview. In order to improve the overview, you can add your own text to the numbers of the listed consignments.   HAVE PARCELS COLLECTED FROM YOUR HOME: With pick@home, the parcel carrier collects your consignment from your home or another address (Swiss Post login required).  PRICES: Calculate prices for consignments to Switzerland and abroad.  SMS POSTAGE STAMP?: No stamp at hand? Simply send an SMS containing the word STAMP to 414, write the code you receive on the right-hand side of the envelope and youre done.  COLLECTION NOTE: Is there a collection note in your letter box? Using the scan function, simply scan the code field on the collection note  then you can select further delivery options.  CUSTOMER SERVICE: Fast and easy access to Swiss Post Customer Service.  SETTINGS: Configure the Post-App to suit your needs.  The Post-App is available in four languages (EN, DE, FR, IT) and the language adapts itself automatically to the Smartphones system language. This can be changed in the Android settings.
